title: Lemon yoghurt cake
directions: Step 1 Preheat oven to 160C. Blend together sugar, eggs, lemon juice and zest, oil and yoghurt. Add flour and salt and blitz until just combined.
Step 2 Transfer to a greased 28-30cm tin and bake 1 1/2 hours or until springy to the touch. Cool before turning out and icing.
Step 3 Mix icing ingredients in a food processor until smooth. Cool to a spreadable consistency then spread over cake. Decorate with extra lemon rind. Serve with whipped cream.
ingredients: Juice and finely grated rind of 4 lemons
Juice and finely grated rind of 1 lemon
